00036                 PPMColGood = RGB(  0,255,  0),
00037                 PPMColWarn = RGB(255,150,  0),
00038                 PPMColErr  = RGB(255,  0,  0),

00042                         c_textConc.SetTextColor(RGB(  0,255,  0));
00043         }

00046                         c_textConc.SetTextColor(RGB(255,  0,  0));

00050                 c_textSubst.SetWindowTextA(name.GetString());

00054         //
00058         inline void SetPPM(CString ppmstr,double ppmundil) {
00059                 CString tval;
00060                 COLORREF setcol;
00061 
00062                 setcol=PPMColGood;
00063                 if ((warn_low!=warn_high) && ((ppmundil<warn_low) || (ppmundil>warn_high)))
00064                         setcol=PPMColWarn;
00065                 if ((err_low!=err_high) && ((ppmundil<err_low) || (ppmundil>err_high)))
00066                         setcol=PPMColErr;
00067                 if (setcol != curcol) {
00068                         curcol=setcol;
00069                         c_textConc.SetTextColor(setcol);
00070                 }
00071 
00072                 c_textConc.SetWindowTextA(ppmstr.GetString());
00073         }
00074 
00075         inline void   setWarnLow(double set) {        warn_low=set; }
00076         inline double getWarnLow()           { return warn_low;     }
00077         inline void   setWarnHigh(double set) {        warn_high=set; }
00078         inline double getWarnHigh()           { return warn_high;     }
00079 
00080         inline void   setErrLow(double set) {        err_low=set; }
00081         inline double getErrLow()           { return err_low;     }
00082         inline void   setErrHigh(double set) {        err_high=set; }
00083         inline double getErrHigh()           { return err_high;     }
